thread.title: WILLIAMSSR/MICHAEL CEDRIC
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by WILLIAMSSR/MICHAEL CEDRIC

author: WILLIAMSSR/MICHAEL CEDRIC
title: WILLIAMSSR/MICHAEL CEDRIC
text:
I was and am very pleased with the professional and caring service that I received from my personal agent Raphael! He was very attentive, patient and understanding. He went to great lengths to find the right flight for me to meet my needs.
I will use ASAP Tickets again when planning a flight in the U.S. or abroad, and I will definitely recommend them to anyone!
